message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. What do you say?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13,500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $13,500 is still a little too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,500. Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $13,000. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
